divs: sighting detailslooking out my patio doors into the bright southern california sky i noticed 3 glowing round objects flying in a triangular formation. at first i thought i was seeing aircraft possibly in a military formation but when i went outside it became clear that these were not any sort of plane or helicopter that i'd ever seen. they changed formation quickly, one of the orbs moving away from the other two. i went into grab my video camera and came back out seconds later but they were gone. i looked at a lot of video on youtube and this one seems the most like what i saw today. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=e9xc1hwlgdm&feature=related
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Monica
There were no other sightings in Santa Monica on or around March 9th 2008
